bibl.title: The Inscriptions of the Neon-Library of Roman Sagalassos.
M. WAELKENS and J. POBLOME, Sagalassos II. Report on the Third Excavation Campaign of 1992
bibl.author: DEVIJVER, Hubert

bibl.note: Seven inscriptions relating to one and the same family. One member, (M.) Iulius Maximianus, is most likely identical with a homonymous iuridicus Alexandreae known from Egyptian papyri (137-139 AD).
bibl.seg: DEVIJVER Hubert, The Inscriptions of the Neon-Library of Roman Sagalassos.
M. WAELKENS and J. POBLOME, Sagalassos II. Report on the Third Excavation Campaign of 1992 = Acta archaeologica Lovaniensia. Monographiae. 6 (Leuven, 1993) pp. 107-123, 2 arbres généal., 11 figg.
